text: So while he slept, Delilah took the seven braids of his hair and wove them into the web. 16:14 See LXX and Vulgate; Hebrew does not include So while he slept, Delilah took the seven braids of his hair and wove them into the web.Then she tightened it with a pin and called to him, “Samson, the Philistines are here!”
